title: Provided further that, the above mentioned rates shall not exceed the rate of premium mentioned in column 4 of Table 7-A under Chapter - 7 where the development permission is sought for the uses mentioned in the said table
clause_text: Provided further that, the above mentioned rates shall not exceed the rate of premium mentioned in column 4 of Table 7-A under Chapter - 7 where the development permission is sought for the uses mentioned in the said table.
